timeline.title: Entered course
timeline.content: <lottie-player class="lottie-player"  src="https://assets10.lottiefiles.com/datafiles/HG7fJRv87EPgmTA/data.json" background="transparent" speed=".8"  style="width: 200px; height: 200px;" autoplay ></lottie-player>

timeline.title: Graduated
timeline.content:
"So as much as learning about UX design can seem tedious, I really appreciate having been through the process,

as now the principles are always in the back of my mind while I work on real-world applications that rely so heavily on getting that part right.

timeline.title: UX/UI Designer - Trimble
timeline.content:
"Trimble is great and full on! I'm learning so much. My role there is very UI-focused so UX plays a huge part in what I do every day.

"Having a solid understanding/appreciation of good UX design is essential; we maintain many complex business systems that are used by both dealers (who stock our hardware and software) and end customers who may never have used the products/applications before. These users are located all around the world and speak many different languages, so designing solutions that are intuitive for everybody is quite the task but is incredibly important.

timeline.title: Graduated
Entered course
timeline.content: <lottie-player class="lottie-player"  src="https://assets10.lottiefiles.com/datafiles/HG7fJRv87EPgmTA/data.json" background="transparent" speed=".8"  style="width: 200px; height: 200px;" autoplay ></lottie-player>

timeline.title: Graduated
timeline.content:
"Learning UX Design has been really useful.

"The UX process has really helped me develop as a designer by helping me understand the ‘why’ in how we design things. It’s been really important about how to effectively target and market a product. Especially when my job focuses on small to medium sized business from every industry. So having skills that help with research and and understanding objectives have been really valuable. An example of a job I have at the moment is for a religious social service website that has A LOT of content to edit down and work with.

timeline.title: Web Designer - Attraction Studio
timeline.content:
"I use tools I’ve gained to help me with create a more robust product.

"For instance, I design layouts in Adobe XD and Sketch and get feedback from designers and marketing staff. Understanding the clients needs and wants while balancing what the product we design for them will do.
